name: EvoTown
description:
On a journey to the Evolution of the Red Town,
a game with a unique story,
a game with adventure and a tactical game at the same time.
Welcome to EvoTown the first-person shooter game
SinglePlayer as well as MultiPlayer.

Convince yourself
● An advanced Anti-Cheat
● Easy to understand for new Players
● Designed for low-end PC
● And more...

GameModes:

[Singleplayer]
No information

[MultiPlayer]
-Palarm- is a skill based game mode in which 3 against 3 players compete against each other there is the Vulgarian House and the Vuled House it is tactical needed to be the victory of the Red Town.
The goal as Vulgarian house is to destroy the Heseran that is at house Vuled and that is not easy
A Heseran is a wall that you have to destroy with your weapon
The wall is not easy to destroy, however, as a team a lot is required to bring it to an end
As house Vuled, the Heseran wall needs to be defended well.
-
-Comper- is a 1vs1 skill based game mode the goal is to destroy the Heseran from the enemy, only then you are a winner of the Red Town
but it is far from over.
Heseran is a wall on the opposing Vulgarian (base) that you can't destroy so quickly, it is about skill, tactics, speed and yourself.
Only one Vulgarian can win in the end and prove whether it is worth being a winner of the Red Town.
